title: null pointer dereference in Sass::Eval::operator()(Sass::Map*)
content:
Feeding @P#{( 0:0)} to ./sassc -s triggers this null pointer dereference.
Code 1.96 KiB

23==9885==ABORTING
steps: Observe the null pointer dereference crash in Sass::Eval::operator()(Sass::Map*)
vuln_description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in libsass when processing specially crafted input strings containing extremely large numbers in interpolation syntax. The vulnerability occurs in the evaluation of Map objects during Sass compilation.
reason: The vulnerability requires crafting a specific input pattern (interpolation with an extremely large number) but doesn't involve complex interactions between components or manipulation of application state. The discovery mainly involves fuzzing or testing edge cases in number handling.
